verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:9
verses.text: And Moses wrote this law, and delivered it unto the priests the sons of Levi, which bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and unto all the elders of Israel.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:10
verses.text: And Moses commanded them, saying, At the end of every seven years, in the solemnity of the year of release, in the feast of tabernacles,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:11
verses.text: When all Israel is come to appear before the Lord thy God in the place which he shall choose, thou shalt read this law before all Israel in their hearing.
